actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend Part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to limit the amount of an individual's wages which is subject to garnishment thereunder, for the enforcement of child support and alimony obligations, to 50 percent of such wages (or such lower amount as may be provided by State law).

summary.text: Amends the program of Child Support and Establishment of Paternity of Title IV of the Social Security Act to limit the portion of an individual's wages from Federal employment which is subject to garnishment for the enforcement of child support and alimony obligations to 50 percent of such wages.

titles.title: A bill to amend Part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to limit the amount of an individual's wages which is subject to garnishment thereunder, for the enforcement of child support and alimony obligations, to 50 percent of such wages (or such lower amount as may be provided by State law).
